required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Tislelizumab in the Systematic Treatment of Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: Real-world Study of Tislelizumab in the Systematic Treatment of Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety (the incidence of adverse events and serious adverse events)
secondary_outcome.description: the incidence of adverse events and serious adverse events

study_pop.textblock: All patients registrated and treated with Tislelizumab at least once were included in the efficacy analysis population as well as the safety analysis population.
